data.executive_summary: Transform Gumloop into the AI-native automation leader by intercepting users at their Zapier breaking point. Capture $50M+ opportunity through strategic content targeting 8,100 monthly searches for 'Zapier too expensive' where Gumloop has ZERO presence. Target 207% ROI proven with enterprise clients.
data.overall_recommendations: Stop competing on features. Own the 'AI-native automation' category while capturing high-intent switchers. Focus 60% effort on migration content, 40% on AI authority building. Implement radical pricing transparency to differentiate from opaque competitors.
data.reasoning_for_recommendations: 78.5% AI automation visibility but <1% general automation awareness. Missing ~$75K MRR from purchase content gap (2 assets vs. 15-20 industry standard). 60% of Zapier defectors choose Make/n8n because they don't know Gumloop exists. Every day of delay means 270 users searching 'Zapier too expensive' choose inferior alternatives.

generated_playbook.executive_summary: Capture the 30-40% of users hitting Zapier's $299/month wall through comprehensive migration enablement content.
